org.pac4j.vertx

Interface EventBusObjectConverter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEventBusObjectConverter, SimpleEventBusObjectConverter

    public interface EventBusObjectConverter
    Interface for encoding and decoding objects for the event bus. This is required for session attributes and the user profile.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Michael Remond

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object decodeObject(Object value)
      Decode the given object encoded with the encodeObject method.
      Object encodeObject(Object value)
      Encode the given object in a compatible form for the event bus.

    • Method Detail

      • encodeObject

        Object encodeObject(Object value)
        Encode the given object in a compatible form for the event bus.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to encode
        Returns:
        the encoded object

      • decodeObject

        Object decodeObject(Object value)
        Decode the given object encoded with the encodeObject method.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to decode
        Returns:
        the decoded object
